title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7332.9 - Assistance to youth
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7332.9 - Assistance to youth

State Regulations

If a grievant is non-English speaking, illiterate or if the
complexity of the issue(s) makes it unlikely that the youth will be able to
adequately present the substance of the grievance, upon the grievant's request
the grievance coordinator shall ensure that the grievant is assisted in the
preparation of the written grievance and at other stages of the grievance
process in which assistance is needed. A grievant may seek the assistance of
other youth with the approval of the director. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7332.9

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
